text: Afrofittonia commonly known as the hunter's weed,Antibacterial effects of the flavonoids of the leaves of Afrofittonia silvestris is a genus of plants in the family Acanthaceae. There is only one species in the genus, Afrofittonia silvestris. It is found in Cameroon, Equatorial Guinea, and Nigeria. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Acanthaceae Category:Acanthaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Monotypic Lamiales genera
title: Afrofittonia
